title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 69.4 - Construction of petition; no answer required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 69.4 - Construction of petition; no answer required

State Regulations
(a) The petition shall be deemed to ask for
such relief as may be just and proper. (b) All allegations of fact in the petition
shall be deemed controverted by the Commissioner of Labor unless expressly
admitted. No answer shall be required. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
69.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
